title: Welcome to Hedgehog
subtitle: 1 of 8
text: This is the home page where you'll be able to access all of your different flows.

title: This is a demo flow
subtitle: 2 of 8
text: A flow maps an organization's customer journey, optimizing business observability.

title: This is a stage
subtitle: 3 of 8
text: A stage represents a high-level functional category in the flow, which consists of multiple steps to complete.

title: This is a level
subtitle: 4 of 8
text: A level collects the potential alternate paths a user may traverse as they progress through this level of the stage. Levels are depicted in numerical order.

title: This is a step
subtitle: 5 of 8
text: A step is an individual gate in the path, usually representing in aggregate an underlying system.

title: This is a signal
subtitle: 6 of 8
text: A signal is a service level that reflects the underlying health of its parent step.

title: These are flow KPIs
subtitle: 7 of 8
text: A flow KPI lets you measure attainment against a target business objective of the overall flow.

title: Create your own flow!
subtitle: 8 of 8
text: Now that you know the basics, you're ready to create your own flow! Clicking this button will open Edit Mode for a new flow. Everything done in Edit Mode is automatically saved.
